message.content:
I need to identify the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period from the financial statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see there is a specific line item called "Beginning Balance" under the "Cash and Cash Equivalents" section. This represents the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period.

From the cash flow statement:
| Account | Amount | Date |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Cash and Cash Equivalents |  | 2024-02-05 |
| Beginning Balance  | 20000000.00 | 2024-02-05 |

This is confirmed by looking at the balance sheet, where the initial amounts for cash-related items are:
- Cash on Hand: 5000000.00 (2023-12-31)
- Bank Deposits: 15000000.00 (2023-12-31)
- Total: 20000000.00

Therefore, the cash and cash equivalents at the beginning of the period is 20000000.00.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '20000000.00'}}
```
